title: Vijay Prakash Yadav
text: Vijay Prakash Yadav is an Indian Politician. He was a Member of the <a href="Bihar%20Legislative%20Assembly">Bihar Legislative Assembly</a> from <a href="Jamui">Jamui</a> until 2020 and former Minister for Labour Resource Department, Government of Bihar from 2015 to 2017. He is younger brother of former Union Minister Of State For Water Resources and senior RJD leader <a href="Jay%20Prakash%20Narayan%20Yadav">Jaiprakash Narayan Yadav</a>
